title: Jalan Macalister Dental Clinic

reviews.name: Lyli Adilla
reviews.text: Cabut gigi and cuci karang gigi walk in or kena buat appointment yea?

reviews.name: Darren Yap
reviews.text: The male dentist very careful n doing his professional job. Keep it up!

reviews.name: Encik Anif
reviews.text: Located on the first floor of Klinik Kesihatan Jalan Macalister. The registration process is fast and easy. Appointments can be conveniently made through MySejahtera, and the service provided is excellent.

reviews.name: Asury's
reviews.text: Dah book apointment by MySejahtera, nurse yg register mintak surat beranak anak, duk pertikai boleh ingat ka no ic anak. Habis tu dlm MySejahtera tu xdak ka details? Suruh usung surat beranak anak merata. Dengan muka x mesra pelanggan langsung mintak penampaq. Nasib la doc layan elok, treatment pun okay xdak masalah. Staff depan kena train lg supaya lebih mesra pelanggan x kisah la dlm kepala tu dah set 'x lama nk balik dah'.

reviews.name: nurul umairah
reviews.text: Registration was pretty fast and everyone was friendly & attentive. This is my first time coming here and the treatment took only about half an hour. Do make appointment first through MySejahtera to avoid waiting for too long. All in all, it was perfect for me.

reviews.name: Azuwa Abdullah
reviews.text: Kecewa sangat dgn rawatan yg diberikan, tau la bayar rm1 ja tapi pesakit kena la buat elok2.. tisu pun tak lapik dkt saya. Then, doktor cabut gigi saya dan langsung tidak memberi ubat, sekarang gigi/gusi saya pun dah bengkak.. Sangat mengecewakan.. first and last ..

street: Klinik Pergigian Jln. Macalister, d/a Klinik Kesihatan Jalan Macalister, Pulau Pinang
description:
At the heart of Penang's bustling healthcare scene, Jalan Macalister Dental Clinic emerges as a premier destination for dental excellence. Specialized in providing comprehensive oral care, the clinic is a cornerstone for those seeking meticulous dental services in the vibrant city of Penang. With an emphasis on preventative dentistry and patient education, the clinic offers a unique value proposition: a personalized approach to oral health that prioritizes long-term results and patient well-being.

Embarking on a patient journey at Jalan Macalister Dental Clinic means experiencing a blend of modern facilities and compassionate care. From routine cleanings to more complex procedures like extractions, patients rave about the careful attention they receive from the highly skilled dental team. One recent testimonial highlights the male dentist's precision and professionalism, reflecting the clinic's commitment to quality care. With operating hours designed to accommodate working individuals, the clinic ensures that maintaining one‚Äôs dental health can fit seamlessly into busy schedules.

Located within the pulse of Penang's healthcare district, the clinic is not just a place for treatment but also a beacon of community health awareness. Accessibility is paramount, with strategic operating hours that cater to diverse lifestyles. Patients appreciate the clinic's proximity to local amenities and ease of access, making it a convenient choice for dental care amidst their daily routines. As Jalan Macalister Dental Clinic continues to serve the community with its distinctive features and specialized care, it remains an integral part of Penang's healthcare tapestry, fostering smiles that are as vibrant as the city itself.

title: Ewe Dental Surgery

reviews.name: Shirley Yeoh
reviews.text: Had my wisdom tooth removed. I was initially scared of the process but it turns out painless and the dentist assured me all the time when my tooth is being extracted . It was challenging for the dentist to remove as my tooth is slightly slanted but he did it well. Nurses are friendly as well, they kept contact with me after my tooth removed and checkup on me. The stitches also well removed after 1 week. I would definitely recommend anyone to come here.

reviews.name: Terry Chai
reviews.text:
I went to get two wisdom tooth extraction from this dentist and i would DEFINITELY recommend here. The Doctor and nurse was very patient with me and give a lot of advice and heads up during the process. The counter was kind as well and give me a call after the surgery to check my with condition.

The entire procedure was super quick and painless too and it was done very professionally and not scary at all. Explanation was given as well ! üòÄ

10/10 would recommend this dentist üëç

reviews.name: Yen Lyn
reviews.text:
Recently visited Ewe Dental for a wisdom tooth extraction and had a great experience.

Dr. Ong took the time to thoroughly explain my situation, showing how clode my wisdom tooth was to the nerve as seen on the Xray.
He provided clear and honest information about the risks and offered treatment options.

The surgery went smoothly, and the pain was much less than I expected. I also appreciated the follow-up call from the nurse the next day to check on my recovery.

Overall, I‚Äôm very satisfied with the care and professionalism at Ewe Dental. Highly recommended!

reviews.name: Yeap Hong Kheng
reviews.text: I recently visited the ewe dental surgery for a wisdom tooth extraction. Despite initial concerns about the size of the tooth, the procedure was remarkably painless. I only felt slight pressure as the dentist carefully extracted the tooth. The dentist's thorough explanation of the process and the nurse's follow-up call demonstrated the clinic's dedication to patient well-being. I'm so impressed that the Dr.Ong reached out three weeks later to inquire about my recovery. I wholeheartedly recommend this clinic for anyone seeking exceptional dental care.

reviews.name: radika rama
reviews.text: Very friendly staff and doctor, good and fast service.

reviews.name: Service Team AP
reviews.text:
Excellent Care for Periodontal Treatment

"I cannot thank Dr. Ong enough for the exceptional care and expertise in treating my periodontal disease. From the very first consultation, Dr. Ong thoroughly explained the condition, available treatment options, and a clear long-term care plan.

The deep cleaning (scaling and root planing) procedure was performed with great precision, and Dr. Ong ensured I was comfortable throughout the process. I especially appreciated the clear post-treatment care instructions, which made managing my recovery much easier.

What truly sets Ewe Dental apart is their commitment to patient education. Dr. Ong not only emphasized the importance of maintaining good oral hygiene to prevent future issues but also provided practical tips tailored specifically to my needs.

The improvement in my gum health has been remarkable, and I am incredibly relieved to have found such a dedicated and knowledgeable dental professional. I highly recommend Ewe Dental to anyone dealing with periodontal issues. They genuinely care about their patients‚Äô well-being and consistently deliver outstanding results."

street: 29-G, MK. 13, Ayer Itam, Penang, 11500, Ayer Itam, Pulau Pinang
description:
In the heart of Ayer Itam, Penang, Ewe Dental Surgery emerges as a pinnacle of dental excellence, where advanced technology meets compassionate care. This esteemed facility is revered for its specialized expertise in wisdom tooth extractions, a procedure that often invokes apprehension amongst patients. However, the narrative at Ewe Dental is one of tranquility and assurance, where fear is replaced with relief through their painless and proficient techniques. The practice's commitment to patient comfort and satisfaction is not just a promise but a consistently delivered reality, as echoed by numerous testimonials praising their gentle approach and exceptional results.

The quality of care at Ewe Dental Surgery transcends beyond the chair; it's an experience that begins with state-of-the-art facilities designed to put patients at ease. From the moment one steps into their welcoming environment, the journey towards optimal dental health is guided by Dr. Ong and the team's meticulous attention to detail. Patient stories are a testament to the caliber of service provided‚Äîtales of seamless wisdom tooth extractions and the unwavering support of staff paint a picture of a healthcare facility that truly values patient well-being. It's this combination of cutting-edge techniques and a nurturing atmosphere that sets Ewe Dental apart from its contemporaries.

Conveniently located within the vibrant Ayer Itam neighborhood, Ewe Dental Surgery resonates with the community's dynamic spirit. Accessibility is a cornerstone of their practice, reflected in their strategic placement and accommodating operating hours catering to busy lifestyles. The facility is not only an integral part of Ayer Itam's fabric but also an accessible haven for those seeking dental solace. By weaving together technical dexterity, heartfelt patient care, and community integration, Ewe Dental solidifies its reputation as a beacon for those seeking exceptional dental care in Penang.
